Scope3EmssnSrc.name: Scope3EmssnSrc
Scope3EmssnSrc.description: Represents scope 3 activities that are the source of greenhouse gas emissions.

AccountNameId.description: Name of the company, it's subsidiary, or it's business unit for which you are doing carbon accounting.

AirTravelEmssnFctrId.description: The air travel emissions factor record that's used to calculate emissions from air travel.

BusinessRegion.description: The business region where this asset is located.

City.description: The city where this asset is located.

Country.description: The country where this asset is located.

FrgtHaulingEmssnFctrId.description: The freight hauling emissions factor record that's used to calculate emissions from freight hauling.

GroundTravelEmssnFctrId.description: The ground travel emissions factor record that's used to calculate emissions from ground travel.

HotelStayEmssnFctrId.description: The hotel stay emissions factor record that's used to calculate emissions from hotel stay during business travel.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ParentEmissionSourceId.description: The parent asset that stores the aggregated emissions data of all the related assets.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of this asset.

RentalCarEmssnFctrId.description: The rental car emissions factor record that's used to calculate emissions from the usage of rental cars.

Scope3EmissionSourceType.description: The type of activity causing emissions, such as business travel.

State.description: The state where this asset is located.
